text: to bhala vah shakhs jise us ka bura kaam shaitaanee (agavo se) achchha kar dikhaaya gaya hai au vah use achchha samajhane laga hai (kabhee momin nekokaar ke baraabar ho sakata hai haragiz nahin) to yaqeenee (baat) ye hai ki khuda jise chaahata hai gumaraahee mein chhod deta hai aur jise chaahata hai raahe raast par aane (kee taufeeq) deta hai to (ai rasool kaheen) un (badabakhton) par aphasos kar karake tumhaare dam na nikal jae jo kuchh ye log karate hain khuda usase khoob vaaqif hai
